items.name: Spider's Leg
items.description: A spider's leg, torn from a fully grown adult spider. Something about it still makes you feel uneasy...

items.name: Skeleton's arm
items.description: A tattered arm torn from a skeleton. The bones are on the verge of snapping.

items.name: Potion of Vitality
items.description: A potion containing a bright yellow substance. It doesn't look so great - Restores 25HP.

items.name: Bulky Skeleton's Arm
items.description: An arm torn from an exceptionally strong skeleton. The bones are harder than steel.

items.name: Mutated Spider's Leg
items.description: A spider's leg covered in cysts and tumors. What could've possibly made it this way?
